page.title: 08GARAGE TRADE
page.content: There are three garages in the area,2 on the Braintree-Chelmsford Rd. and 1 at Fuller St.At Fuller St. no petrol is served but a coach service is operated from there.They transport prisoners from Chelmsford prison to a county court ,and on to other prisons if need be. One of the garages is owned by a naional company,but does very little car servicing.The other has 5 mechanics and 10 other staff.Both garages sell approximately 30,000 litres a week at 43.91pence per litre.This price was correct on the 24th of June 1985.They get their petrol from ULTRAMAR refineries at Purfleet,Essex.Most people pay for petrol by cash,but 40% use credit cards.
